text: “Egh ia gɨn nguazir kam dughiar ruarimɨn an ikɨvɨra ikɨ, egh boriba batɨtɨ ian ovavir borir gɨn otivamiba, bizitabar nedazibar mɨn marvir guatabar ingaran markɨ. Ia kamaghɨn damu arazir kuram damigham. Arazir kam Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian Godɨn damazimɨn derazir puvatɨ, egha a gami a bar anɨngaghe.
